title: Enhancing Nursing Practice Competencies: Designing Computational Thinking Learning Through Data-Driven Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Basic data literacy and comprehension of programming concepts
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Analyzing patterns in diverse language datasets to extract meaningful insights
Developing data-driven problem-solving models applicable to real-world professional scenarios (medical/legal/technical)

Learners will implement a dashboard visualizing medical data (e.g., patient records, vaccination rates) using Python-based programming tools (e.g., Matplotlib, Seaborn) and design a simple decision-support system (e.g., patient risk classification) with â‰¥80% accuracy.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
